DESCRIPTION: 回合结束时， cards in your h并with #yFire #yCounters make you take damage equal to their #yFire #yCounter. They then increase the #yFire #yCounter. Cards with #yFire #yCounters play an additional copy of themselves for every #yFire #yCounter above #b1, 并#y消耗 。
After a number of turns, add #b2 #yDespairs to your h并并失去 #b5 #y力量 。
